briefdescription.para: ov7725 load set of register-value pairs

parameterdescription.para: register-value pair in 2-d array form, ex. reg_values[][2] = {{COM3, 0x1}};

memberdef.name: COM3_SWAP_BR
memberdef.initializer: (0x20U) /* Swap B/R output sequence in RGB output mode */

memberdef.name: COM3_SWAP_YUV
memberdef.initializer: (0x10U) /* Swap Y/UV output sequence in YUV output mode */

memberdef.name: COM3_TRI_CLOCK
memberdef.initializer: (0x04U) /* Tri-state option for output clock at power-down period */

memberdef.name: COM3_TRI_DATA
memberdef.initializer: (0x02U) /* Tri-state option for output data at power-down period */

memberdef.name: COM3_COLOR_BAR
memberdef.initializer: (0x01U) /* Sensor color bar test pattern output enable */

memberdef.name: COM5_AFR
memberdef.initializer: (0x80U) /* Auto frame rate control ON/OFF selection (night mode) */

memberdef.name: COM5_AFR_SPEED
memberdef.initializer: (0x40U) /* Auto frame rate control speed selection */

memberdef.name: COM5_AFR_4x
memberdef.initializer: (0x04U) /* Add frame when AGC reaches 4x gain */

memberdef.name: COM5_AFR_8x
memberdef.initializer: (0x08U) /* Add frame when AGC reaches 8x gain */

memberdef.name: COM5_AFR_16x
memberdef.initializer: (0x0cU) /* Add frame when AGC reaches 16x gain */

memberdef.name: COM5_AEC_NO_LIMIT
memberdef.initializer: (0x01U) /* No limit to AEC increase step */

memberdef.name: COM6_AUTO_WINDOW
memberdef.initializer: (0x01U) /* Auto window setting ON/OFF selection when format changes */

memberdef.name: COM8_STEP_VSYNC
memberdef.initializer: (0x00U) /* AEC - Step size limited to vertical blank */

memberdef.name: COM8_STEP_UNLIMIT
memberdef.initializer: (0x40U) /* AEC - Step size unlimited step size */

memberdef.name: COM9_HISTO_AVG
memberdef.initializer: (0x80U) /* Histogram or average based AEC/AGC selection */

memberdef.name: COM9_DROP_VSYNC
memberdef.initializer: (0x04U) /* Drop VSYNC output of corrupt frame */

memberdef.name: COM9_DROP_HREF
memberdef.initializer: (0x02U) /* Drop HREF output of corrupt frame */

memberdef.name: COM10_PCLK_FREE
memberdef.initializer: (0x00U) /* PCLK output option: free running PCLK */

memberdef.name: COM10_PCLK_MASK
memberdef.initializer: (0x20U) /* PCLK output option: masked during horizontal blank */

memberdef.name: COM10_VSYNC_FALLING
memberdef.initializer: (0x00U) /* VSYNC changes on falling edge of PCLK */

memberdef.name: COM10_VSYNC_RISING
memberdef.initializer: (0x04U) /* VSYNC changes on rising edge of PCLK */

memberdef.name: COM10_OUT_RANGE_10
memberdef.initializer: (0x00U) /* Output data range: Data from [10] to [F0] (8 MSBs) */

memberdef.name: HSTART
memberdef.initializer: (0x17U) /* Horizontal Frame (HREF column) Start 8 MSBs (2 LSBs are at HREF[5:4]) */

memberdef.name: HSIZE
memberdef.initializer: (0x18U) /* Horizontal Sensor Size (2 LSBs are at HREF[1:0]) */

memberdef.name: VSTART
memberdef.initializer: (0x19U) /* Vertical Frame (row) Start 8 MSBs (1 LSB is at HREF[6]) */

memberdef.name: VSIZE
memberdef.initializer: (0x1AU) /* Vertical Sensor Size (1 LSB is at HREF[2]) */

memberdef.name: LAEC
memberdef.initializer: (0x1FU) /* Fine AEC Value - defines exposure value less than one row period */

memberdef.name: REG28
memberdef.initializer: (0x28U) /* Selection on the number of dummy rows, N */

memberdef.name: HOUTSIZE
memberdef.initializer: (0x29U) /* Horizontal Data Output Size MSBs (2 LSBs at register EXHCH[1:0]) */

memberdef.name: VOUTSIZE
memberdef.initializer: (0x2CU) /* Vertical Data Output Size MSBs (LSB at register EXHCH[2]) */

memberdef.name: ADVFL
memberdef.initializer: (0x2DU) /* LSB of Insert Dummy Rows in Vertical Sync (1 bit equals 1 row) */

memberdef.name: ADVFH
memberdef.initializer: (0x2EU) /* MSB of Insert Dummy Rows in Vertical Sync */

memberdef.name: LUMHTH
memberdef.initializer: (0x30U) /* Histogram AEC/AGC Luminance High Level Threshold */

memberdef.name: LUMLTH
memberdef.initializer: (0x31U) /* Histogram AEC/AGC Luminance Low Level Threshold */

memberdef.name: ADOFF_B
memberdef.initializer: (0x35U) /* AD Offset Compensation Value for B Channel */

memberdef.name: ADOFF_R
memberdef.initializer: (0x36U) /* AD Offset Compensation Value for R Channel */

memberdef.name: ADOFF_GB
memberdef.initializer: (0x37U) /* AD Offset Compensation Value for GB Channel */

memberdef.name: ADOFF_GR
memberdef.initializer: (0x38U) /* AD Offset Compensation Value for GR Channel */

memberdef.name: OFF_B
memberdef.initializer: (0x39U) /* AD Offset Compensation Value for B Channel */

memberdef.name: OFF_R
memberdef.initializer: (0x3AU) /* AD Offset Compensation Value for R Channel */

memberdef.name: OFF_GB
memberdef.initializer: (0x3BU) /* AD Offset Compensation Value for GB Channel */

memberdef.name: OFF_GR
memberdef.initializer: (0x3CU) /* AD Offset Compensation Value for GR Channel */

memberdef.name: COM12
memberdef.initializer: (0x3DU) /* DC offset compensation for analog process */

memberdef.name: COM13_ANALOG_BLC
memberdef.initializer: (0x20U) /* Analog processing channel BLC ON/OFF control */

memberdef.name: LC_CTR_RGB_COMP_1
memberdef.initializer: (0x00U) /* R, G, and B channel compensation coefficient is set by LC_COEF ((0x49U)) */

memberdef.name: LC_XC
memberdef.initializer: (0x47U) /* X Coordinate of Lens Correction Center Relative to Array Center */

memberdef.name: LC_YC
memberdef.initializer: (0x48U) /* Y Coordinate of Lens Correction Center Relative to Array Center */

memberdef.name: LC_COEFB
memberdef.initializer: (0x4BU) /* Lens Correction B Channel Compensation Coefficient */

memberdef.name: LC_COEFR
memberdef.initializer: (0x4CU) /* Lens Correction R Channel Compensation Coefficient */

memberdef.name: GAM1
memberdef.initializer: (0x7EU) /* Gamma Curve 1st Segment Input End Point (0x04U) Output Value */

memberdef.name: GAM2
memberdef.initializer: (0x7FU) /* Gamma Curve 2nd Segment Input End Point (0x08U) Output Value */

memberdef.name: GAM3
memberdef.initializer: (0x80U) /* Gamma Curve 3rd Segment Input End Point (0x10U) Output Value */

memberdef.name: GAM4
memberdef.initializer: (0x81U) /* Gamma Curve 4th Segment Input End Point (0x20U) Output Value */

memberdef.name: GAM5
memberdef.initializer: (0x82U) /* Gamma Curve 5th Segment Input End Point (0x28U) Output Value */

memberdef.name: GAM6
memberdef.initializer: (0x83U) /* Gamma Curve 6th Segment Input End Point (0x30U) Output Value */

memberdef.name: GAM7
memberdef.initializer: (0x84U) /* Gamma Curve 7th Segment Input End Point (0x38U) Output Value */

memberdef.name: GAM8
memberdef.initializer: (0x85U) /* Gamma Curve 8th Segment Input End Point (0x40U) Output Value */

memberdef.name: GAM9
memberdef.initializer: (0x86U) /* Gamma Curve 9th Segment Input End Point (0x48U) Output Value */

memberdef.name: GAM10
memberdef.initializer: (0x87U) /* Gamma Curve 10th Segment Input End Point (0x50U) Output Value */

memberdef.name: GAM11
memberdef.initializer: (0x88U) /* Gamma Curve 11th Segment Input End Point (0x60U) Output Value */

memberdef.name: GAM12
memberdef.initializer: (0x89U) /* Gamma Curve 12th Segment Input End Point (0x70U) Output Value */

memberdef.name: GAM13
memberdef.initializer: (0x8AU) /* Gamma Curve 13th Segment Input End Point (0x90U) Output Value */

memberdef.name: GAM14
memberdef.initializer: (0x8BU) /* Gamma Curve 14th Segment Input End Point (0xB0U) Output Value */

memberdef.name: GAM15
memberdef.initializer: (0x8CU) /* Gamma Curve 15th Segment Input End Point (0xD0U) Output Value */

memberdef.name: SIGN_BIT
memberdef.initializer: (0xABU) /* Sign Bit for Hue and Brightness */

memberdef.name: DSPAUTO_SCAL1_EN
memberdef.initializer: (0x04U) /* Auto scaling factor control (registers SCAL1 ((0xA1U) and SCAL2 ((0xA2U)))*/
